member.name: M:ATSEP.MapNetworkDriver.WNetAddConnection2(ATSEP.MapNetworkDriver.NETRESOURCE@,System.String,System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates a connection to a network resource
member.param: A NETRESOURCE structure that specifies information about the network resource connection
The password to use for the connection - leave blank to use current user credentials
The username to use for the connection - leave blank to use current user credentials
Bitmask that specifies connection options. For example, whether or not to make the connection persistent

member.name: T:ATSEP.MapNetworkDriver.NETRESOURCE
member.summary: Contains information about a network resource. Used by the WNetAddConnection2 method

member.name: M:ATSEP.MapNetworkDriver.MapNetworkDrive(System.String,System.Char,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a network drive (aka mapped drive) using the specified drive letter, UNC path and optional credentials
member.param: The UNC path (\\servername\share) to map the drive letter to

False to have this drive removed when the user logs off. True to have the drive remembered. This option is the equivelant of the Reconnect At Logon checkbox shown when mapping a drive in Windows Exporer
The username to use for the connection - optional
The password to use for the connection - optional
